resources.string:
1. It is safer for single women in India to live or travel with at least 1 or 2 other people.

 2. Never accept food and drinks from complete strangers.
 
3. Your eye contact with strange men should be brief and never intimate 
 
 4. Never get into a cab or auto that has more than one man sitting in there. 

 5. Be alert to your environment and the people around you at all times. 

 6. Listen to your gut instinct and donâ€™t second guess it. (It is better to be wrong and safe than wrong and sorry!) 

 6. Act on your observations and instincts intelligently. 

 7. Donot forget to use Women Security App(WSA) when in danger.
